text: This was the first edition of the tournament. Roberto Carballés Baena won the title after defeating Mikael Ymer 2–6, 6–0, 6–2 in the final. ==Seeds== All seeds receive a bye into the second round. ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ====Section 1==== ====Section 2==== ===Bottom half=== ====Section 3==== ====Section 4==== ==References== *Main Draw *Qualifying Draw Murcia Open - Singles
title: 2019 Murcia Open – Singles
